TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 將使用者在輸入控制項中輸入的值與在其他輸入控制項中輸入的值 (或常數值) 相比較。

span.span: Compares the value entered by the user in an input control with the value entered in another input control, or with a constant value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用例如在輸入控制項中，使用者所輸入的值相比較的控制項控制項，與另一個輸入的控制項或常值中輸入的值。Use the control to compare the value entered by the user in an input control, such as a control, with the value entered in another input control or a constant value. 控制項通過驗證，如果輸入控制項的值符合所指定的準則， ，和/或屬性。The control passes validation if the value of the input control matches the criteria specified by the , , and/or properties. 您也可以使用指出輸入控制項中輸入的值是否可以轉換成資料類型所指定的控制項屬性。You can also use the control to indicate whether the value entered in an input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 指定要驗證設定的輸入的控制項屬性。Specify the input control to validate by setting the property. 如果您想要比較的另一個輸入控制項的特定輸入的控制項，將設定屬性來指定要比較的控制項。If you want to compare a specific input control with another input control, set the property to specify the control to compare with. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的輸入控制項中輸入值無法將屬性轉換為所指定的資料型別屬性，但在所指定的輸入控制項中輸入值可轉換到屬性，要驗證的輸入的控制項被視為有效。If the value entered in the input control specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, but the value entered in the input control specified by the property can be converted, the input control being validated is considered valid. 因此，您也應該放置或是上所指定的輸入控制項的控制項屬性。Therefore, you should also place a or control on the input control specified by the property. 而非比較與另一個輸入的控制項輸入控制項的值時，您可以比較輸入控制項為常數值的值。Instead of comparing the value of an input control with another input control, you can compare the value of an input control to a constant value. 指定要設定與比較的常數值屬性。Specify the constant value to compare with by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果所指定的值無法將屬性轉換為所指定的資料型別 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the value specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. 請務必檢查的資料類型的值之前以程式設計方式將它指派給屬性。Be sure to check the data type of a value before programmatically assigning it to the property. > [!NOTE] > 未設定兩者和屬性在相同的時間。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您可以比較輸入控制項到另一個輸入的控制項，或為常數值的值。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 使用屬性來指定要執行，例如大於、 等於為等等的比較類型。Use the property to specify the type of comparison to perform, such as greater than, equal to, and so on. 如果您設定屬性，以`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，則控制項會忽略和屬性，只會指出輸入控制項中輸入的值是否可轉換為所指定的資料類型屬性。If you set the property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, the control ignores the and properties and simply indicates whether the value entered in the input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 屬性用來指定這兩個比較值的資料類型。The property is used to specify the data type of both comparison values. 執行比較作業之前，這兩個值自動轉換成這個資料類型。Both values are automatically converted to this data type before the comparison operation is performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當屬性設定為且目前的月曆類型非西曆，驗證程式執行僅在伺服器端驗證。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 驗證用戶端指令碼僅支援西曆日曆。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出可以比較各種資料類型。The following table lists the various data types that can be compared. |資料類型Data type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字串資料型別。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位元帶正負號的整數資料型別。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|雙精確度浮點數資料型別。A double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|日期資料型別。A date data type.| |`Currency`|十進位資料類型。A decimal data type. 它不能包含貨幣符號。It cannot contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 如果輸入的控制項是空的沒有驗證函式會呼叫並驗證成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用控制項來要求使用者輸入控制項中輸入的資料。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用內控制控制項，請確定驗證程式控制項和其相關聯的控制項位於相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需使用詳細資訊控制項的部分頁面更新，請參閱[網頁局部呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 協助工具Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來比較兩個值的控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to compare the values in two controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會將所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含要在用戶端呈現的輸出資料流。

span.span: A that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.

summary.span: 將這個控制項的屬性加入至輸出資料流中，以在用戶端呈現。

span.span: Adds the attributes of this control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓一律會以粗體顯示的錯誤訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Function ControlPropertiesValid () As Boolean

summary.span: 檢查控制項的屬性值是否有效。

span.span: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.

returns.span: 如果控制項屬性 (Control Property) 有效則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使它一律會傳回值的 visible 屬性，只要屬性控制頁面上，並包含驗證屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

exception.span: 目標屬性的值無法轉換成必要的 。

span.span: The value of a target property cannot be converted to the expected .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ControlToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ControlToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定輸入控制項，以與驗證中的輸入控制項相比較。

span.span: Gets or sets the input control to compare with the input control being validated.

value.span: 要與所驗證的輸入控制項比較的輸入控制項。

span.span: The input control to compare with the input control being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定輸入的控制項，例如控制項，與要驗證的輸入控制項比較。Use the property to specify an input control, such as a control, to compare with the input control being validated. 如果這個屬性所指定的輸入的控制項不是頁面上的控制項，則會擲回例外狀況。If the input control specified by this property is not a control on the page, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 未設定兩者和屬性在相同的時間。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您可以比較輸入控制項到另一個輸入的控制項，或為常數值的值。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果要比較的控制項隱藏的或為容器內 (例如控制項)，看不到，驗證程式執行僅在伺服器端驗證。If the control to compare is hidden or is inside a container (such as a control) that is not visible, the validator performs server-side validation only. 驗證用戶端指令碼支援可見的控制項。The validator client script supports only visible controls. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要與要驗證的控制項比較的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the control to compare with the control being validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool EvaluateIsValid() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function EvaluateIsValid () As Boolean

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法含有程式碼以判斷輸入控制項中的值是否有效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method contains the code to determine whether the value in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果輸入控制項中的值有效，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，使它一律會傳回`true`兩個指定的控制項的值是否相同和`false`否則。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns `true` if the values of the two specified controls are the same and `false` otherwise. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator Operator { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要執行的比較作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the comparison operation to perform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要執行的比較作業。Use the property to specify the comparison operation to perform. 下表列出可能的比較作業。The following table lists the comparison operations that are possible. |運算Operation|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Equal`|要驗證的輸入的控制項和另一個控制項的值或常數的值之間的相等比較。A comparison for equality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`NotEqual`|要驗證的輸入的控制項和另一個控制項的值或常數的值之間不相等比較。A comparison for inequality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThan`|要驗證的輸入的控制項和另一個控制項的值或常數的值之間的大於比較。A comparison for greater than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThanEqual`|大於或等於另一個控制項，以及要驗證的輸入的控制項的值或常數的值之間的比較。A comparison for greater than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThan`|要驗證的輸入的控制項和另一個控制項的值或常數的值之間的小於比較。A comparison for less than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThanEqual`|小於或等於另一個控制項，以及要驗證的輸入的控制項的值或常數的值之間的比較。A comparison for less than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`DataTypeCheck`|要驗證的輸入控制項中輸入的值和所指定之資料類型的資料型別比較屬性。A data type comparison of the value entered in the input control being validated and the data type specified by the property. 如果值無法轉換成指定的資料類型，則驗證失敗。Validation fails if the value cannot be converted to the specified data type. **注意︰** 和這個運算子使用時，會忽略屬性。**Note:** The and properties are ignored when this operator is used.| 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的比較作業。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the comparison operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的比較作業不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified comparison operator is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValueToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValueToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定常數值，以與使用者在正在驗證之輸入控制項中輸入的值相比較。

span.span: Gets or sets a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.

value.span: 常數值，這個值會與使用者在所要驗證的輸入控制項中輸入的值進行比較。

span.span: The constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要與所要驗證的輸入控制項中的使用者輸入的值相比較的常數值。Use the property to specify a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated. 如果這個屬性所指定的常數值無法轉換成所指定的資料型別 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the constant value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 未設定兩者和屬性在相同的時間。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您可以比較輸入控制項到另一個輸入的控制項，或為常數值的值。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果設定這兩個屬性，屬性會優先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以在使用者所輸入的值相比較與常數值的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the value entered by the user in a control with a constant value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
